reviews.content: Works great on iPhone 8, iOS 12.4 running unc0ver 4.2.1!  Absolutely helps speed the iOS UI up as opposed to nothing at all.
Very solid tweak and a good improvement of the old tweak! Worth the $1.50.

Works well on ip11pm 13.5.

Wish descriptions were more clear.
Great tweak for changing the speed of system animations. Highly recommend it
works immediately after respring. Over time, animation speed becomes instant and does not respect user defined values. respring fixes this for a short period until it bugs out again.
Crashing Endomondo, even whole it is on the Excluded apps list.
Conflicts with snowboard status bar causing random resprings
Messages like to show up blank screen when using fast animations within messages app.
